divs: sighting details18:15 11\23\11 yucaipa, ca chapman heights & cramer rd. looking southwest appeared to be at about 3,000 ft observed a pulsing red light, period about 1\sec, traveling southwest at 3,000ft. observed two brighter white lights that appeared to descend from the red light, trailing sparks. red light disappeared, and white lights appeared to disappear on the ground with no apparent secondary explosions, about 7 to 10 miles southwest of observation point.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Yucaipa
There were no other sightings in Yucaipa on or around November 23rd 2011
